ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:18:07 [Issue ID 4000-107737] urn:comicvine:4000-107737 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:32:32. [Issue ID 249132]
ComicInfo.Summary: Cyberforce, under the influence of Misery, continues to find the WildC.A.T.s. Warblade and Ripclaw fight and they both collapse, but Warblade continues to rise to get Misery. She is forced to loosen her control on the members of Cyberforce to contend with Warblade. This momentary relieve allows Cyberforce and WildC.A.T.s to stop their battle and Warblade cuts through Misery. It is revealed that Misery is actually a bio-synthetic organism with the real Misery's memories. She reveals how she really was the traitorous one all those years ago in the S.H.O.C. and then passes away. Warblade opens the stasis pod and learns it is actually the arm of Spartan that a Coda had cut off months ago in a battle. Cyberforce and WildC.A.T.s then depart on amicable terms.
ComicInfo.Title: Killer Instinct - Part 4
ComicInfo.Writer: David Wohl,Eric Silvestri,Marc Silvestri,Eric Silvestri,David Wohl,Marc Silvestri
